IEEE Draft Standard Criteria for Digital Computers in Safety Systems of Nuclear Power Generating Stations
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P7-4.3.2/D4, Feb 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Additional computer specific requirements to supplement the criteria and requirements of IEEE Std 603-2009 are specified. Within the context of this standard, the term computer is a system that includes computer hardware, software, firmware, and interfaces. The criteria contained herein, in conjunction with criteria in IEEE Std 603-2009, establish minimum functional and design requirements for computers used as components of a safety system.
